name: Understanding Coercion Tactics
description: Breaking down the psychological, financial, and operational methods used to control individuals through blackmail and coercion.

cards.title: The Psychology of Blackmail
cards.description: How fear, shame, and reputation management are weaponized.
bulletpoints: Understanding how blackmailers exploit guilt and psychological pressure.
Identifying the key vulnerabilities targeted for coercion.
Recognizing staged moral dilemmas and forced compromises.
cards.summaryText: See how blackmail rides guilt, spot your vulnerabilities, and catch staged compromises early.

cards.title: Kompromat and Entrapment Tactics
cards.description: How intelligence agencies and criminal networks manufacture leverage.
bulletpoints: Using honeypots and controlled environments to create compromising situations.
Recording illicit activity as leverage for long-term compliance.
Fabrication of evidence and deepfake technology as modern blackmail tools.
cards.summaryText: Understand honeypots, recorded leverage, and fabricated proof as the scaffolding of coercion.

cards.title: The Extortion Pyramid

bulletpoints: How compromised individuals are forced to compromise others.

Identifying escalation tactics used when resistance is attempted.
